aboutusintro.title: About 123 Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing in the Heart of Jamnagar
aboutusintro.description: 123 Brass is a leading brass forging manufacturer located in Jamnagar, specializing in custom metal components for diverse industrial applications. Founded with a commitment to precision and quality, we leverage advanced manufacturing technologies to deliver exceptional forged solutions that meet the most demanding specifications.

items.name: Rajesh Patel
items.content: 123 Brass has been our go-to forging partner for complex automotive components. Their precision and reliability are unmatched in the industry.

items.name: Sameer Khan
items.content: Exceptional quality, timely delivery, and outstanding customer support. 123 Brass consistently exceeds our expectations.
